alert.note: Alert for Price (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 2:24AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Price County through 300 AM CDT... At 224 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Phillips, to near Catawba, to 8 miles east of Jump River, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Phillips around 230 AM CDT. Prentice around 240 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Ogema and Spirit. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
